title: Capture a new moment
subtitle: Your coach will guide you through this moment step by step.

coach.entryType: Hi! What kind of moment would you like to capture?
coach.foodEaten: What did you eat or drink?
coach.description: Is there anything you want to write about this moment?
coach.behavior: Was there anything special about this moment?
coach.bookmark: Do you want to save this moment?
coach.confirm: Here is a summary of your moment. Does everything look right?
coach.complete: Well done! Your moment has been saved.

form.entryType: What kind of moment would you like to capture?
form.location: Where and with whom were you?
form.foodEaten: What did you eat or drink?
form.behavior: Was there anything special about this moment?
form.complete: Well done! Your moment has been saved.
form.switchToForm: Prefer to fill it in yourself?
form.deleteConfirm: Delete this moment? This action cannot be undone.
form.bookmark: Do you want to save this moment?

leavePrompt.message: Leave without saving this moment? Press OK to leave or Cancel to keep editing.

placeholders.foodEatenAi: You can later add a photo and have it analysed with AI.

hints.behavior: You don't have to fill this in.
